[Umujyi, igihugu]

[Umujyi, igihugu]

Muraho [Izina ry'uwandikiwe],

 Nishimiye kukwandikira uyu munsi. Ndakeka ko umunsi wawe uhagaze neza. Nifuzaga kukubaza uko umeze, kuko umunsi wanjye wagendanye n'ibintu byinshi byiza.

 Ndibuka ibihe byiza twagiranye mu minsi yashize, cyane cyane ubwo twajyaga [shyiramo igikorwa cyiza mwakoze hamwe]. Nari nishimiye cyane. Nkwifurije umunsi mwiza kandi ntegereje igisubizo cyawe. Urakoze!

 [Izina ryawe]
Muraho, kunywa amazi menshi, kuruhuka, kandi niba bikomeje, ugomba kujya kwa muganga
Ushobora kubona ibitabo by'umunyeshuri kuri website ya NESA cyangwa Ministeri y'Uburezi
Kwizera Caleb ni umu developer wo mu Rwanda, ukora ku mishinga itandukanye ya software, kandi afasha abantu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu buryo bwiza.

patterns: Ubu perezida w'u Rwanda ni nde?
Mbwira ibijyanye na perezida w'u Rwanda.
responses: Perezida w'u Rwanda ni Paul Kagame, amaze igihe kinini ayobora igihugu kuva mu mwaka wa 2000.
Programming ni uburyo bwo guhanga software, aho ukoresha indimi nka Python, Java, cyangwa C++. Ni ingenzi mu ikoranabuhanga.
Yego, izina ry'iyi AI ni Mwalimu.ai! Ni umufasha mu kwigisha no gusobanura.
Mudasobwa ni igikoresho gikoreshwa mu gukoresha software, ibarura, no gukora ibindi bikorwa byinshi. Ikora hifashishijwe ibice bitandukanye nka CPU, RAM, na disk.
U Rwanda ni igihugu gito muri Africa yo uburasira zuba

Rwanda nziza Gihugu cyacu
Wuje imisozi, ibiyaga n'ibirunga
Ngobyi iduhetse gahorane ishya.
Reka tukurate tukuvuge ibigwi
Wowe utubumbiye hamwe twese
Abanyarwanda uko watubyaye
Berwa, sugira, singizwa iteka.

Horana Imana, murage mwiza
Ibyo tugukesha ntibishyikirwa;
Umuco dusangiye uraturanga
Ururimi rwacu rukaduhuza
Ubwenge, umutima, amaboko yacu
Nibigukungahaze bikwiye
Nuko utere imbere ubutitsa.

Abakurambere b'intwari
Bitanze batizigama
Baraguhanga uvamo ubukombe
Utsinda ubukoroni na mpatsibihugu
Byayogoje Afurika yose
None uraganje mu bwigenge
Tubukomeyeho uko turi twese.

Komeza imihigo Rwanda dukunda
Duhagurukiye kukwitangira
Ngo amahoro asabe mu bagutuye
Wishyire wizane muri byose
Urangwe n'ishyaka, utere imbere
Uhamye umubano n'amahanga yose
Maze ijabo ryawe riguhe ijambo.
